org.hibernate.ogm.options.navigation

Interface GlobalContext<G extends GlobalContext<G,E>,E extends EntityContext<E,?>>

  • Type Parameters:
    G - the type of a provider-specific global context definition, following the self-referential generic type pattern
    E - the type of provider-specific entity context definition, associated with the specific global context type
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DocumentStoreGlobalContext<G,E>, InfinispanGlobalContext, InfinispanRemoteGlobalContext, KeyValueStoreGlobalContext<G,E>, MongoDBGlobalContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseDocumentStoreGlobalContext, BaseGlobalContext, BaseKeyValueStoreGlobalContext

    public interface GlobalContext<G extends GlobalContext<G,E>,E extends EntityContext<E,?>>
    Entry point to the options navigation API. Let's you define global level options as well as navigate to a specific entity level.

    Implementations must declare a constructor with a single parameter of type ConfigurationContext and should preferably be derived from BaseEntityContext.

    Author:
    Emmanuel Bernard <emmanuel@hibernate.org>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      E entity(Class<?> type)
      Specify mapping for the entity type

      • entity

        E entity(Class<?> type)
        Specify mapping for the entity type
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the entity
